descript.abstract: This dataset shows port location within study area. It was derived from HAZUS database, which has its own metadata:This database was developed from the dataset Port and Waterway Facilities obtained from the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers/CEIWR, Navigation Data Center, Ports and Waterways Division. PBS&J converted to database into a format that was compatible with the HAZUS software.
descript.purpose: This data is used to estimate the damage (and resulting loss of functionality) associated with port facilities for a given flood, hurricane, and/or earthquake scenario. The damage estimates are subsequently used to compute the estimated cost to repair or replace the damaged port facilities.

All parties receiving these data must be informed of these restrictions. The Nature Conservancy shall be acknowledged as data contributors to any reports or other products derived from these data.
idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.1.0.3035

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.
